channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 22:23 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 22:23 Driven the alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 22:23 Drive alarm to Cherkasy region.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 游릭 22:23 Drive alarm to Cherkasy region.Creck on subsequent messages.#Cherkasy_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
